name: Diceway
description:
Intro

Diceway is a plateformer runner, where you play as a One-Face Dice, hunted by a Giant Dice. Because he's racist. 

The thing is, every time the Giant Dice moves, he change his face, and so does the level.

Try to escape the Dice, and surviving all thoses plateforms.

Controls (European)

(Q)-(D)  Deplacements

(Z)-(S) Deplacement only in 4 (Green)

(Space) Jump

(R) Reset

Music

Pulsar - Kavinsky (Remix)

Ekoguane Games Team :

Lenain 'Ekoon' Simon (Game Designer, Game Programmer) - https://ekoon.itch.io/

Bon 'Iboguane' Ivan (Game Artist) - https://iboguane.itch.io/
